name: SoundQuizzer
0:
”Alexa, start sound quizzer!”
”That's a duck!”
”That's a cow!”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sound quizzer
des:
Teach your little one to identify new words and sounds. Starting with animal sounds, they'll learn the difference between a cow's moo and a dog's woof with the help of Alexa.

Ask Alexa to play "sound quizzer", and she'll then present your child with a sound to identify. Alexa will listen in and let your child know if she was correct!

More sounds coming soon!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
